title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When code assist is invoked, the file is marked as dirtied even when no changes are made, and code assist does not appear.
EB: Code assist should only mark the file as dirtied if there are actual changes made. If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not dirtied the file.
SR: Review the code assist functionality to ensure that file dirtiness is accurately tied to actual changes made during code assist.
